#include <iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
   int T,N,D;
    cin>>T;
     while(T--)
     {
        long long int num,p=1;
       	 cin>>N>>D;
       	 num=0;
       
       while(N>0){
         int rem=N%D;
           N=N/D;
         num=p*rem + num;
         p=p*10;
       }
       
        cout<<num<<endl;
     }
 
 	return 0;
}
